00023                 struct MemberController
00024                 {
00025                         float time;
00026                         bstype speed;

00031                 {

00033                         bstype special[NUM_SPECIAL_MEMBERS];
00034 
00035                         MemberController controllers[NUM_SPECIAL_MEMBERS];

00037                 };

00040                 // bytecode for this event.
00041                 struct Event

00043                         String name;
